attributes.action: make it compulsory that Glasgow Celtic F.C. stop signing ugly footballers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This step is necessary due to the fact that more and more Celtic F.C. matches are being broadcast by Setanta and young children who may watch these games unsupervised will be unduly frightened and this could lead to psychological problems and a fear of all football matches, which in these difficult financial times may be detrimental to ALL football clubs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
